name: Incision trend
functionStatement: Long-term changes in channel size and slope maintain dynamic equilibrium and diverse habitats while interacting with the floodplain.
descriptionMarkdown: No active headcuts or fully stabilized ones; no ongoing incision or bank widening.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Locate headcuts or knickpoints and estimate migration using multi-date elevation or imagery. Confirm in the field.

levels.label: Optimal
levels.criteriaMarkdown: No active headcuts. Any legacy headcuts are stable.

levels.label: Suboptimal
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Small local headcuts with limited progression potential.

levels.label: Marginal
levels.criteriaMarkdown: One or two active headcuts with noticeable vertical instability.

levels.label: Poor
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Multiple or large active headcuts rapidly advancing and driving incision and failures.

references: repeat LiDAR for DEM of Difference (where available)
NAIP or Google Earth time series.
